00024 #ifndef COIN_SOENGINEOUTPUT_H
00025 #define COIN_SOENGINEOUTPUT_H

00029 #include <Inventor/lists/SbList.h>
00030 
00031 class SoNotList;
00032 class SoFieldContainer;
00033 class SoEngine;
00034 class SoNodeEngine;
00035 
00036 class COIN_DLL_API SoEngineOutput {
00037 public:
00038   SoEngineOutput(void);
00039   virtual ~SoEngineOutput();
00040 
00041   SoType getConnectionType(void) const;
00042   int getForwardConnections(SoFieldList & fl) const;
00043   void enable(const SbBool flag);
00044   SbBool isEnabled(void) const;
00045   SoEngine * getContainer(void) const;
00046   SoNodeEngine * getNodeContainer(void) const;
00047   SbBool isNodeEngineOutput(void) const;
00048 
00049   void setContainer(SoEngine * engine);
00050   void setNodeContainer(SoNodeEngine * nodeengine);
00051   void addConnection(SoField * f);
00052   void removeConnection(SoField * f);
00053   int getNumConnections(void) const;
00054   SoField * operator[](int i) const;
00055 
00056   void prepareToWrite(void) const;
00057   void doneWriting(void) const;
00058 
00059   void touchSlaves(SoNotList * nl, SbBool donotify);
00060 
00061   SoFieldContainer * getFieldContainer(void);
00062 
00063 private:
00064   SbBool enabled;
00065   SoEngine * container;
00066   SoFieldList slaves;
00067   SbList<SbBool> fieldnotiflist;
00068 };
